change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Winnie Ruth Judd was a defendant in a murder trial in Phoenix, Arizona. Opening brief for appellant and reply brief of appellant for State of Arizona vs. Winnie Ruth Judd, Supreme Court, State of Arizona, No. 779. Carbon typescript; also contains index to cases cited in appellant's reply brief.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Opening Brief and Reply Brief (AZ 214). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Defendant in murder trial; Phoenix, Ariz.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized in order of proceedings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Opening brief for appellant and reply brief of appellant for State of Arizona vs. Winnie Ruth Judd, Supreme Court, State of Arizona, No. 779. Carbon typescript; also contains index to cases cited in appellant's reply brief.
